meta.name: ChAMAI Checklist
meta.description: Checklist for assessing methodological quality of medical AI studies following CRISP-DM.

items.label: Study population described
items.description: Is the study population described, including inclusion and exclusion criteria?

items.label: Clinical context and rationale
items.description: Is the clinical context clearly defined and is a rationale provided for using AI/ML?

items.label: Clear research objectives
items.description: Are the research objectives clearly stated and aligned with the clinical problem?

items.label: Intended use specified
items.description: Is the intended use of the AI/ML system described (screening, diagnosis, prognosis, etc.)?

items.label: Outcome definition
items.description: Is the predicted outcome or task clearly defined and measurable?

items.label: Ethical and clinical relevance
items.description: Does the study explain the ethical or clinical relevance of addressing the problem?

items.label: Data source described
items.description: Is the source of the data described (registry, clinical center, multi-site, etc.)?

items.label: Dataset characteristics
items.description: Are dataset characteristics reported (sample size, distribution, demographics)?

items.label: Bias or imbalance reported
items.description: Does the study report any data imbalance, bias or representativeness issues?

items.label: Preprocessing steps
items.description: Are data preprocessing steps (cleaning, normalization, transformations) described?

items.label: Handling missing data
items.description: Is the strategy for handling missing data described and justified?

items.label: Feature selection/extraction
items.description: Are feature engineering, selection or extraction procedures documented?

items.label: Train/test split methodology
items.description: Is the dataset splitting strategy described and appropriate (e.g., cross-validation, hold-out)?

items.label: Model type justified
items.description: Is the choice of model type (ML, DL, ensemble, etc.) justified for the problem?

items.label: Hyperparameters documented
items.description: Are model hyperparameters or optimization strategies reported?

items.label: Explainability addressed
items.description: Does the study describe any explainability or interpretability approach (e.g., SHAP, Grad-CAM)?

items.label: Performance metrics appropriate
items.description: Are the chosen performance metrics appropriate for the task and clearly defined?

items.label: Internal validation performed
items.description: Does the study provide internal validation results (cross-validation, bootstrap, etc.)?

items.label: External validation (if applicable)
items.description: Is external validation reported when required by the clinical application?

items.label: Comparison with baselines
items.description: Does the study compare the proposed model with baseline or existing methods?

items.label: Uncertainty quantification
items.description: Is uncertainty or confidence estimation reported (CI, variance, calibration)?

items.label: Robustness analysis
items.description: Does the study evaluate robustness (noise, missingness, sensitivity analysis)?

items.label: Statistical significance
items.description: Are statistical tests or significance analyses provided when comparing models?

items.label: Generalizability discussed
items.description: Does the study discuss generalizability to other settings, populations or hospitals?

items.label: Clinical workflow integration
items.description: Is there discussion of how the AI system integrates into clinical workflow?

items.label: Risk and safety considerations
items.description: Does the study address safety, potential harms, or failure modes of the AI system?

items.label: Regulatory or ethics considerations
items.description: Are regulatory, ethical or legal constraints discussed (GDPR, FDA/CE, bias, fairness)?

items.label: Deployment scenario
items.description: Is a real or hypothetical deployment scenario described (technical requirements, environment)?

items.label: Limitations acknowledged
items.description: Are study limitations explicitly acknowledged?

items.label: Future work
items.description: Does the study describe potential improvements or future research directions?
